title: Mahindra & Mahindra Financial to expand mortgage business
description: Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services plans to expand its mortgage loan business, offering housing finance, top-up loans, and home improvement loans. The Mumbai-based NBFC will also join the government's affordable housing schemes. The company aims to invest 200-300 million rupees over the next year for this expansion.
